text: Giovanni "Gianni" Agnelli, (; 12 March 192124 January 2003), also known as L'Avvocato ("The Lawyer"), was an Italian businessman. He was known for his business career with Fiat. As the head of Fiat, he controlled 4.4% of Italy's GDP. He was the richest man in modern Italian history. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:People from Turin
title: Gianni Agnelli
